inapplicable.help: ARIA progressbar nodes must have an accessible name

inapplicable.help: Certain ARIA roles must contain particular children

inapplicable.help: ARIA treeitem nodes should have an accessible name

inapplicable.help: Table header text must not be empty

inapplicable.help: Banner landmark should not be contained in another landmark

inapplicable.help: Aside should not be contained in another landmark

inapplicable.description: Ensures the contentinfo landmark is at top level

inapplicable.help: Main landmark should not be contained in another landmark

passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(3) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > h1:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(4) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(5) > div > ul > li:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(5) > div > ul > li:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(5) > div > ul > li:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(10) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h2
